name: Racing City
description:
Pull off amazing stunts and drive anywhere in the huge city in the latest fun open world blocky car 

driving simulators! Stylized after the iconic block-style, enjoy driving entertainment like you've never seen before.

Game Features:

- Many vehicles to drive

- Massive open world

- Unique stunt and jumps to try

- Fun, easy to drive controls

- Iconic block style graphics

- Simulated driving physics

- Hours of driving fun

Explore the massive environment, drive fast down city streets, get some serious air time by jumping off stunt jumps, 

roll, flip, drift, and more for as long as you want in the all new simulation block driving game.

Unlock more cars to drive by performing stunts and wrecking the city. Perform bigger jumps, smash into objects and 

drifts to gain more credits to build your car collection.
